description: T.1000  Horse Chestnut - Deadwood.T.1415 Sycamore - deadwood and remove ivy severing ivy at base.T.1418 London Plane - 2-3m Holistic crown reduction (3-4m on North side to rebalance), remove ivy & deadwood.T.1420 Common Lime - Crown lift to 5m over road & deadwood.
